name: LIZA: THE UNGRATEFUL
description:
LIZA: THE UNGRATEFUL is a story about a woman

who neglects the safety of her baby during pregnancy

and seeks to find the one who caused the flash.

Note: Only major releases of the game I consider finished.  

Patch Notes 1.1.0

adjusted various enemy health

changed some dialouge 

rebalanced party members 

fixed various bugs
